name: gulp-data
description: Generate a data object from a variety of sources: json, front-matter, databases, promises, anything... and set it to the file object for other plugins to consume.

0.0.1.name: gulp-data
0.0.1.description: Generate a data object for other plugins to consume.

scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
